hexagrams.judgment: THE CREATIVE works sublime success, Furthering through perseverance.
hexagrams.image: The movement of heaven is full of power. Thus the superior man makes himself strong and untiring.

hexagrams.judgment: THE RECEPTIVE brings sublime success. Perseverance of a mare brings good fortune.
hexagrams.image: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. Thus the superior man who has breadth of character carries the outer world.

hexagrams.judgment: DIFFICULTY AT THE BEGINNING works supreme success. Nothing should be undertaken.
hexagrams.image: Clouds and thunder: The image of Difficulty at the Beginning. Thus the superior man brings order out of confusion.

hexagrams.judgment: YOUTHFUL FOLLY has success. It is not I who seek the young fool.
hexagrams.image: A spring wells up at the foot of the mountain: The image of Youth. Thus the superior man fosters his character by thoroughness in all that he does.

hexagrams.judgment: WAITING. If you are sincere, you have light and success.
hexagrams.image: Clouds rise up to heaven: The image of Waiting. Thus the superior man eats and drinks, is joyous and of good cheer.

hexagrams.judgment: CONFLICT. A cautious halt halfway brings good fortune.
hexagrams.image: Heaven and water go their opposite ways: The image of Conflict. Thus in all his transactions the superior man carefully considers the beginning.

hexagrams.judgment: THE ARMY needs perseverance and a strong man.
hexagrams.image: In the middle of the earth is water: The image of the Army. Thus the superior man increases his masses by generosity toward the people.
lines: Army must set forth in order.
In the midst of the army.

hexagrams.judgment: HOLDING TOGETHER brings good fortune.
hexagrams.image: On the earth is water: The image of Holding Together. Thus the kings of antiquity bestowed the different states as fiefs and cultivated friendly relations with the feudal lords.

hexagrams.judgment: THE TAMING POWER OF THE SMALL has success.
hexagrams.image: The wind drives across heaven: The image of the Taming Power of the Small. Thus the superior man refines the outward aspect of his nature.

hexagrams.judgment: TREADING upon the tail of the tiger. It does not bite.
hexagrams.image: Heaven above, the lake below: The image of Treading. Thus the superior man discriminates between high and low, and thereby fortifies the thinking of the people.

hexagrams.judgment: PEACE. The small departs, the great approaches.
hexagrams.image: Heaven and earth unite: The image of Peace. Thus the ruler divides and completes the course of heaven and earth, and so aids the people.
lines: No plain not followed by slope.

hexagrams.judgment: STANDSTILL. The great departs; the small approaches.
hexagrams.image: Heaven and earth do not unite: The image of Standstill. Thus the superior man falls back upon his inner worth in order to escape the difficulties.

hexagrams.judgment: FELLOWSHIP WITH MEN in the open. Success.
hexagrams.image: Heaven together with fire: The image of Fellowship with Men. Thus the superior man organizes the clans and distinguishes things.

hexagrams.judgment: POSSESSION IN GREAT MEASURE. Supreme success.
hexagrams.image: Fire in heaven above: The image of Possession in Great Measure. Thus the superior man curbs evil and furthers good, and thereby obeys the benevolent will of heaven.
lines: Prince offers to Son of Heaven.

hexagrams.judgment: MODESTY creates success.
hexagrams.image: Within the earth, a mountain: The image of Modesty. Thus the superior man reduces that which is too much, and augments that which is too little.

hexagrams.judgment: ENTHUSIASM. It furthers one to install helpers.
hexagrams.image: Thunder comes resounding out of the earth: The image of Enthusiasm. Thus the ancient kings made music in order to honor merit, and offered it with splendor to the Supreme Deity.

hexagrams.judgment: FOLLOWING has supreme success.
hexagrams.image: Thunder in the middle of the lake: The image of Following. Thus the superior man at nightfall goes indoors for rest and recuperation.

hexagrams.judgment: WORK ON WHAT HAS BEEN SPOILED has supreme success.
hexagrams.image: The wind blows low on the mountain: The image of Decay. Thus the superior man stirs up the people and strengthens their spirit.

hexagrams.judgment: APPROACH has supreme success.
hexagrams.image: The earth above the lake: The image of Approach. Thus the superior man is inexhaustible in his will to teach, and without limits in his tolerance and protection of the people.

hexagrams.judgment: CONTEMPLATION. The ablution has been made.
hexagrams.image: The wind blows over the earth: The image of Contemplation. Thus the kings of old visited the regions of the world, contemplated the people, and gave them instruction.

hexagrams.judgment: BITING THROUGH has success.
hexagrams.image: Thunder and lightning: The image of Biting Through. Thus the kings of former times made firm the laws through clearly defined penalties.

hexagrams.judgment: GRACE has success in small matters.
hexagrams.image: Fire at the foot of the mountain: The image of Grace. Thus does the superior man proceed when clearing up current affairs. But he dare not decide controversial issues in this way.

hexagrams.judgment: SPLITTING APART. It does not further to go anywhere.
hexagrams.image: The mountain rests on the earth: The image of Splitting Apart. Thus those above can ensure their position only by giving generously to those below.

hexagrams.judgment: RETURN. Success. Going out and coming in without error.
hexagrams.image: Thunder within the earth: The image of the Turning Point. Thus the kings of antiquity closed the passes at the time of solstice. Merchants and strangers did not go about.

hexagrams.judgment: INNOCENCE. Supreme success.
hexagrams.image: Under heaven thunder rolls: All things attain the natural state of innocence. Thus the kings of old, rich in virtue, and in harmony with the time, fostered and nourished all beings.

hexagrams.judgment: THE TAMING POWER OF THE GREAT. Perseverance furthers.
hexagrams.image: Heaven within the mountain: The image of the Taming Power of the Great. Thus the superior man acquaints himself with many sayings of antiquity and many deeds of the past.

hexagrams.judgment: THE CORNERS OF THE MOUTH. Perseverance brings good fortune.
hexagrams.image: At the foot of the mountain, thunder: The image of Providing Nourishment. Thus the superior man is careful of his words and temperate in eating and drinking.

hexagrams.judgment: PREPONDERANCE OF THE GREAT. The ridgepole sags.
hexagrams.image: The lake rises above the trees: The image of Preponderance of the Great. Thus the superior man, when he stands alone, is unconcerned, and if he has to renounce the world, he is undaunted.

hexagrams.judgment: THE ABYSMAL repeated. If sincere, success in heart.
hexagrams.image: Water flows on uninterruptedly and reaches its goal: The image of the Abysmal repeated. Thus the superior man walks in lasting virtue and carries on the business of teaching.
lines: Jug of wine, bowl of rice.

hexagrams.judgment: THE CLINGING. Perseverance furthers.
hexagrams.image: That which is bright rises twice: The image of Fire. Thus the great man, by perpetuating this brightness, illumines the four quarters of the world.

hexagrams.judgment: INFLUENCE. Success. To take a maiden to wife.
hexagrams.image: A lake on the mountain: The image of Influence. Thus the superior man encourages people to approach him by his readiness to receive them.

hexagrams.judgment: DURATION. Success. No blame.
hexagrams.image: Thunder and wind: the image of Duration. Thus the superior man stands firm and does not change his direction.

hexagrams.judgment: RETREAT. Success.
hexagrams.image: Mountain under heaven: The image of Retreat. Thus the superior man keeps the inferior man at a distance, not angrily but with reserve.

hexagrams.judgment: THE POWER OF THE GREAT. Perseverance furthers.
hexagrams.image: Thunder in heaven above: The image of the Power of the Great. Thus the superior man does not tread upon paths that do not accord with established order.

hexagrams.judgment: PROGRESS. The powerful prince is honored.
hexagrams.image: The sun rises over the earth: The image of Progress. Thus the superior man himself brightens his bright virtue.

hexagrams.judgment: DARKENING OF THE LIGHT. In adversity, be persevering.
hexagrams.image: The light has sunk into the earth: The image of Darkening of the Light. Thus does the superior man live with the great mass: He veils his light, yet still shines.

hexagrams.judgment: THE FAMILY. The perseverance of the woman furthers.
hexagrams.image: Wind comes forth from fire: The image of the Family. Thus the superior man has substance in his words and duration in his way of life.

hexagrams.judgment: OPPOSITION. In small matters, good fortune.
hexagrams.image: Above, fire; below, the lake: The image of Opposition. Thus amid all fellowship the superior man retains his individuality.

hexagrams.judgment: OBSTRUCTION. The southwest furthers.
hexagrams.image: Water on the mountain: The image of Obstruction. Thus the superior man turns his attention to himself and molds his character.

hexagrams.judgment: DELIVERANCE. The southwest furthers.
hexagrams.image: Thunder and rain set in: The image of Deliverance. Thus the superior man pardons mistakes and forgives misdeeds.

hexagrams.judgment: DECREASE combined with sincerity brings good fortune.
hexagrams.image: At the foot of the mountain, the lake: The image of Decrease. Thus the superior man controls his anger and restrains his instincts.

hexagrams.judgment: INCREASE. It furthers one to undertake something.
hexagrams.image: Wind and thunder: The image of Increase. Thus the superior man: If he sees good, he imitates it; If he has faults, he rids himself of them.

hexagrams.judgment: BREAK-THROUGH. One must resolutely make known.
hexagrams.image: The lake has risen up to heaven: The image of Break-through. Thus the superior man dispenses riches downward and refrains from resting on his virtue.

hexagrams.judgment: COMING TO MEET. The maiden is powerful.
hexagrams.image: Under heaven, wind: The image of Coming to Meet. Thus does the prince act when disseminating his commands to the four quarters of heaven.

hexagrams.judgment: GATHERING TOGETHER. Success.
hexagrams.image: Over the earth, the lake: The image of Gathering Together. Thus the superior man renews his weapons in order to meet the unforeseen.

hexagrams.judgment: PUSHING UP has supreme success.
hexagrams.image: Within the earth, wood grows: The image of Pushing Up. Thus the superior man of devoted character heaps up small things in order to achieve something high and great.

hexagrams.judgment: OPPRESSION. Success. Perseverance.
hexagrams.image: There is no water in the lake: The image of Exhaustion. Thus the superior man stakes his life on following his will.

hexagrams.judgment: THE WELL. The town may be changed, the well cannot.
hexagrams.image: Water over wood: The image of the Well. Thus the superior man encourages the people at their work, and exhorts them to help one another.

hexagrams.judgment: REVOLUTION. On your own day you are believed.
hexagrams.image: Fire in the lake: The image of Revolution. Thus the superior man sets the calendar in order and makes the seasons clear.

hexagrams.judgment: THE CAULDRON. Supreme good fortune.
hexagrams.image: Fire over wood: The image of the Cauldron. Thus the superior man consolidates his fate by making his position correct.

hexagrams.judgment: SHOCK brings success.
hexagrams.image: Thunder repeated: The image of Shock. Thus in fear and trembling the superior man sets his life in order and examines himself.

hexagrams.judgment: KEEPING STILL. Keeping his back still.
hexagrams.image: Mountains standing close: The image of Keeping Still. Thus the superior man does not permit his thoughts to go beyond his situation.

hexagrams.judgment: DEVELOPMENT. The maiden is given in marriage.
hexagrams.image: On the mountain, a tree: The image of Development. Thus the superior man abides in dignity and virtue, in order to improve the mores.

hexagrams.judgment: THE MARRYING MAIDEN. Undertakings bring misfortune.
hexagrams.image: Thunder over the lake: The image of the Marrying Maiden. Thus the superior man understands the transitory in the light of the eternity of the end.

hexagrams.judgment: ABUNDANCE has success. Be like the sun at midday.
hexagrams.image: Both thunder and lightning come: The image of Abundance. Thus the superior man decides lawsuits and carries out punishments.

hexagrams.judgment: THE WANDERER. Success through smallness.
hexagrams.image: Fire on the mountain: The image of the Wanderer. Thus the superior man is clear-minded and cautious in imposing penalties, and protracts no lawsuits.

hexagrams.judgment: THE GENTLE. Success through what is small.
hexagrams.image: Winds following one upon the other: The image of the Gently Penetrating. Thus the superior man spreads his commands abroad and carries out his undertakings.

hexagrams.judgment: THE JOYOUS. Success. Perseverance furthers.
hexagrams.image: Lakes resting one on the other: The image of the Joyous. Thus the superior man joins with his friends for discussion and practice.

hexagrams.judgment: DISPERSION. Success.
hexagrams.image: The wind driving over water: The image of Dispersion. Thus the kings of old sacrificed to the Lord and built temples.

hexagrams.judgment: LIMITATION. Success.
hexagrams.image: Water over lake: The image of Limitation. Thus the superior man creates number and measure, and examines the nature of virtue and correct conduct.

hexagrams.judgment: INNER TRUTH. Pigs and fishes. Good fortune.
hexagrams.image: Wind over lake: The image of Inner Truth. Thus the superior man discusses criminal cases in order to delay executions.

hexagrams.judgment: PREPONDERANCE OF THE SMALL. Success.
hexagrams.image: Thunder on the mountain: The image of Preponderance of the Small. Thus in his conduct the superior man gives preponderance to reverence. In bereavement he gives preponderance to grief. In his expenditures he gives preponderance to thrift.

hexagrams.judgment: AFTER COMPLETION. Success in small matters.
hexagrams.image: Water over fire: The image of the condition After Completion. Thus the superior man takes thought of misfortune and arms himself against it in advance.

hexagrams.judgment: BEFORE COMPLETION. Success.
hexagrams.image: Fire over water: The image of the condition Before Completion. Thus the superior man is careful in the differentiation of things so that each finds its place.
